section.title: description
section.p: The preview plugin allows you to hide "preview" entries from normal display. Preview entries are identified with a configurable prefix at the start of the title of the blog entry. By default, the preview plugin uses the prefix of "PREVIEW" to indicate that an entry is preview only.

PREVIEW_PASSWORD is the password that must be supplied for the "preview" URL parameter to have preview entries displayed

section.title: usage
section.p: To mark an entry as preview, use the configured prefix at the beginning of the title of your blog entry.
